title: Parties and Property
content: This Lease Agreement is entered into on {{date}} between the Landlord and the Tenant, {{tenant_name}}, for the property located at {{address}}.

title: Monthly Rent
content: The Tenant agrees to pay a monthly rent of {{rent_amount}}, payable on the first of every month.

title: Security Deposit
content: A security deposit of {{deposit_amount}} shall be held by the Landlord. (Note: Under legal guidelines, this should not exceed two months' rent).
